mapper.insert: insert into child_attraction ( attraction_name, category1, category2, category3, latitude, longitude, road_address, address, phone_number, homepage, closed_day, operating_time, nursing_room, stroller, kid_zone, ) values ( #{attraction_name}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{category3}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{road_address}, #{address}, #{phone_number}, #{homepage}, #{closed_day}, #{operating_time}, #{nursing_room}, #{stroller}, #{kid_zone} );
